hero.title: Maubin Navigation
hero.subtitle: Plan meaningful journeys across Myanmar's historic cities, sacred pagodas, colonial avenues, vibrant markets and cultural landscapes. We help you explore rich heritage while finding the shortest smart routes between landmarks.
